nodes.text: Snowblind was the name of a giant Pantran whitefang living on Hoth until 3642 BBY, when it was killed on the its hunting grounds in the Crystal Wastes.

Snowblind appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Hoth. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
